what: Functions for managing the states of the quiz — quiz_get_state
title: Functions for managing the states of the quiz — quiz_get_state
text: quiz states question final state quiz ends. one state can active time question text answers shown depend state active. get set functions retrieving state values setting values. states originally created via reactiveValues call within Shiny server (list outside Shiny; see example ). See post-treatment learning module working example.

title: Functions for managing the states of the quiz — quiz_get_state
code: quiz_get_state(store, variable = NULL, state = NULL)  quiz_set_state(store, variable, value, state = NULL)  quiz_is_answer_correct(answer, key)  quiz_is_current_correct(store)  quiz_check_is_each_correct(store)  quiz_is_all_correct(store)  quiz_in_sandbox_mode(store)  quiz_ui_quiz_complete(   store,   ns,   message_correct,   message_wrong,   message_skipped )  quiz_ui_quiz_complete_report(store)  quiz_ui_question(store, ns)

title: Functions for managing the states of the quiz — quiz_get_state
text: store list formatted like example variable one c('current-question', 'current-correct-answer', 'next-state', 'current-response') state one c('quiz-question-1', ..., 'quiz-question')

title: Functions for managing the states of the quiz — quiz_get_state
Functions for managing the states of the quiz — quiz_get_state
text: quiz_get_state(): getter function state machine quiz_set_state(): setter function state machine quiz_is_answer_correct(): Backup function check answer matches response, agnostic ordering quiz_is_current_correct(): check current-response correct quiz_check_is_each_correct(): check recorded answers correct return boolean vector quiz_is_all_correct(): check recorded answers correct quiz_in_sandbox_mode(): Check quiz sandbox mode quiz_ui_quiz_complete(): UI show quiz completed quiz_ui_quiz_complete_report(): Quiz score table correct answers show end quiz_ui_question(): UI show question

title: Functions for managing the states of the quiz — quiz_get_state
Functions for managing the states of the quiz — quiz_get_state
code: if (FALSE) { question_1 <- "This is question 1" question_2 <- "This is question 2" question_texts <- list(question_1, question_2) question_prompts <- list(radioButtons(...), radioButtons(...)) correct_answers <- list(c('1a'), c('2b')) # use shiny::reactiveValues() in lieu of list() store <- list(   state = 'quiz-question-1',   states = c(paste0('quiz-question-', seq_along(question_texts)), 'quiz-complete'),   question_texts = question_texts,   question_prompts = question_prompts,   correct_answers = correct_answers,   responses = c('yes', NA, NA),   skipped = FALSE,   sandbox_mode = FALSE ) quiz_get_state(store, 'current-question') }

quiz module — quiz_ui
code: quiz_ui(id)  quiz_server(   id,   id_parent = character(0),   quiz,   embed_quiz = TRUE,   sandbox_mode = FALSE )
